overview: The music of guitar virtuoso Muriel Anderson is the focus of this program that mixes nature scenes filmed across the globe in high-definition with performance footage. Accompanying Anderson are acclaimed 7 time Grammy winning drummer Paul Wertico of Pat Metheny fame, Les Paul Trio bassist Nicki Parrott, and renowned cellist Julie Adams for atmospheric versions of "Two Shores," "Moonscape," "Wild Dog Days," "Waterfalls," "Living Out a Dream," and more.
title: Muriel Anderson - A Guitarscape Planet
